ResearchProjectDef.label: Remote Detonator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a console that detonates remote explosives. Comes with two types of remote mining charges. Research Explosive IEDs or Incendiary IEDs to deploy combat-grade remote explosives.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Remote EMP Charge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the deployment of EMP charges that can be triggered with a remote detonator. While expensive, they can be devastating against mechanoids.
